summary: A diverse group of full-of-attitude New Yorkers reveals how a hidden world of beautiful wild birds in the middle of Manhattan has upended and magically transformed their lives.
cast: Regina Alvarez|Anya Auerbach|Mike Bryant|David Burg|Irving Cantor|Christian Cooper|Joe DiCostanzo|John Fitzpatrick|John Flicker|Jonathan Franzen|Dick Gershon|Catherine Hamilton|Jeffrey Kimball|Harry Maas|Chuck McAlexander|Glenn Phillips|Jonathan Rosen|Starr Saphir|David Speiser|Lloyd Spitalnik|Marie Winn
title: Birders: The Central Park Effect
